name: GBA Console & Games Wiki
description:
This version supports a iPhone 5/iPod touch 5th (4-inch Retina Display).

This App is a summary of Game Boy Advance console and games information.
You can read at anytime without the Internet connection.
Most contents of this application are quotations from Wikipedia.

Features
-Game Boy Advance console information
-Bestseller 30 Game Boy Advance games basic information
-Direct Wikipedia & YouTube links (Internet connection required)
-Retina display support
-No advertise
-Controller home screen icon (Icon name "GBA")
